publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3548 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeesâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Discontinuance of Legalised Police Cells (Ayr) Rules 2002 (SSI 2002/472).
